org.netbeans.api.debugger

Class ActiveBreakpoints

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.netbeans.api.debugger.ActiveBreakpoints

  • public final class ActiveBreakpoints
extends Object
    This class handles an engine-related breakpoints activation/deactivation, which is independent on their enabled/disabled state.
    Since:
    1.51

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String PROP_BREAKPOINTS_ACTIVE
      Property change fired when breakpoints activation/deactivation changes.

      Test if the engine's breakpoints are currently active.

      Get an ActiveBreakpoints instance for a debugger engine.

    • Field Detail

      • PROP_BREAKPOINTS_ACTIVE

        public static final String PROP_BREAKPOINTS_ACTIVE
        Property change fired when breakpoints activation/deactivation changes.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • get

        public static ActiveBreakpoints get(DebuggerEngine debuggerEngine)
        Get an ActiveBreakpoints instance for a debugger engine.
        Parameters:
        debuggerEngine - the debugger engine.
        Returns:
        The ActiveBreakpoints instance, that delegates to an BreakpointsActivationProvider provided in it's lookup.

      • canDeactivateBreakpoints

        public boolean canDeactivateBreakpoints()
        Test if breakpoint deactivation is supported. When false is returned, setBreakpointsActive(boolean) throws UnsupportedOperationException when called with false argument.
        Returns:
        true when engine-related breakpoints can be deactivated, false otherwise.

      • areBreakpointsActive

        public boolean areBreakpointsActive()
        Test if the engine's breakpoints are currently active.
        Returns:
        true when breakpoints are active, false otherwise.

      • setBreakpointsActive

        public void setBreakpointsActive(boolean active)
                          throws UnsupportedOperationException
        Activate or deactivate breakpoints handled by this debugger engine. The breakpoints activation/deactivation is independent on breakpoints enabled/disabled state.
        Parameters:
        active - true to activate breakpoints, false to deactivate them.
        Throws:
        UnsupportedOperationException - when there is an attempt to deactivate breakpoints even though canDeactivateBreakpoints() return false

      • addPropertyChangeListener

        public final void addPropertyChangeListener(PropertyChangeListener l)
        Add a property change listener to be notified about properties defined as PROP_* constants.
        Parameters:
        l - a property change listener

      • removePropertyChangeListener

        public final void removePropertyChangeListener(PropertyChangeListener l)
        Remove a property change listener.
        Parameters:
        l - a property change listener
